snippet: “Honk NYC!” is bringing brass bands from all over the world to New York this week, including a Friday night gala at the Gowanus Ballroom.
lead_paragraph: “Honk NYC!” is bringing brass bands from all over the world to New York this week, including a Friday night gala at the Gowanus Ballroom.

headline.main: A Gala for Brass in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: A Gala for Brass in Brooklyn
